claim: Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).

combined_evidence.quote: Two large studies have explored rVE of recombinant quadrivalent influenza vaccine (RIV4). The Medicare beneficiaries study [10] using retrospective data as described above, reported significant rVE of RIV4 vs. SD-IIV4) against influenza related hospital encounters. Secondly, a randomized controlled trial (RCT) found significant rVE of RIV4 compared with SD-IIV4 among adults 50 years old, but not for adults 65 years old [11].
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote explicitly states that a randomized controlled trial (RCT) compared the recombinant quadrivalent influenza vaccine (RIV4, which is Flublok) with the standard dose quadrivalent influenza vaccine (SD-IIV4, which includes Fluarix), directly supporting the claim that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in a pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).

combined_evidence.quote: Secondly, a randomized controlled trial (RCT) found significant rVE of RIV4 compared with SD-IIV4 among adults 50 years old, but not for adults 65 years old [11].
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote further clarifies that the pivotal trial was a randomized controlled trial directly comparing RIV4 (Flublok) and SD-IIV4 (which includes Fluarix), confirming the head-to-head evaluation required by the claim.

combined_evidence.quote: SD-IIV4 included Afluria, Fluarix, FluLaval, Standard Dose Fluzone and FlucelVax. HD-IIV4 was High Dose Fluzone, RIV4 was Flublok and Adj-IV was FluAd.
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote defines the vaccine types used in the study, confirming that Flublok (RIV4) and Fluarix (SD-IIV4) were among the vaccines compared, directly supporting the claim that Flublok was evaluated against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).

combined_evidence.quote: c RIV4: Flublok. c SD-IIV4: Afluria, Fluarix, FluLaval, Standard Dose Flu zone and FlucelVax.
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote explicitly identifies Flublok as RIV4 and Fluarix as one of the SD-IIV4 comparators, confirming that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine) in the study.
